news.title: WBD tells shareholders Netflix deal is superior to Paramount offer: 'It was not a hard choice,' chairman tells CNBC
news.summary: Paramount launched a hostile bid for WBD, taking a $30-per-share, all-cash offer directly to shareholders. The offer is expected to be accepted by shareholders.

news.title: Tricolor executives charged with 'systematic fraud' after subprime auto lender roiled banking sector
news.summary: Prosecutors allege senior managers orchestrated schemes that allowed Tricolor to obtain billions of dollars from lenders by misrepresenting collateral. Prosecutors: Senior managers orchestrated scheme to get billions from lenders.

news.title: Oil rebounds from lowest levels since 2021 after Trump orders Venezuela oil tanker blockade
news.summary: U.S. President Donald Trump said he ordered a "total and complete" blockade of sanctioned oil tankers leaving and entering Venezuela. He said the move was aimed at stopping the flow of oil into the country.

news.title: Apple punted on AI this year. Next year will be critical
news.summary: Apple this year delayed its big Siri upgrade to 2026. As the company looks ahead, the pressure is on for the iPhone maker to show investors its AI strategy.

news.title: My 401(k) plan is emailing me about annuities, but I’m only in my 50s. Is this something I should do?
news.summary: Signing up for an annuity is something you want to carefully consider. Options will keep coming, but signing up is something to consider carefully.

news.title: Precious metals are going to party like it’s the 1970s, reckons Albert Edwards
news.summary: “Is gold’s 60% rally this year merely the appetizer for a late-1970s-style main course?” asks Edwards.

news.title: Energy stocks are the new bonds, this strategist argues
news.summary: In an inflationary setting, why hold bonds at all, says Louis-Vincent Gave. Gave: Why hold bonds in the first place?

news.title: Why 2025 has been such a historic year for oil — with prices set to finish near a 5-year low
news.summary: The world has more oil than it needs, but a drop in crude prices this week may help slow production and boost demand. Oil prices dropped to the lowest level in nearly five years this week.

news.title: ‘We all have economic jitters’: After the Fed cut rates, should my son buy a $600K house?
news.summary: “They are tuned in to friends and colleagues, who are losing jobs, cognizant of shifts in company agendas and financial worries,” she says.
